content: fi rst stitch over that one * repeat twice ■ bind off last stitch tail ■ *crochet chain a few inches join at the beginning* repeat varying the length of your chains ■ cut yarn and sew to the chicken butt ■ make as many as you like in diff erent colors finishing ■ sew the beak stuff it if you want legs and wings to the chicken ■ done © patricia evans 2014 no duplicating except for personal use
